text: Cunon ki ʙa pajomʙarone pes az tu vahj firistodem, hamcunin ruhe az amri Xudro (Qur'onro) ʙa farmoni Xud ʙa tu vahj kardem, ki sarcasmai hajoti dilho ast. Tu ej Rasul, namedonisti kitoʙu imon cist. Vale Mo on Qur'onro nure soxtem, to har jak az ʙandagonamonro, ki ʙixohem, ʙa on hidojat kunem va haroina, tu mardumro ʙo in Qur'on ʙa rohi rost roh menamoi va on rohi Islom ast
